content: अच्छावाकः [अच्छं निर्मलं अच्छ आभिमुख्येन वा वक्ति शंसति; वच् कर्तरि संज्ञायां घञ् निपातस्य चेति दीर्घः <ls>Tv.</ls>] The invoker or inviter, a priest or Ṛtvij who is employed at Soma sacrifices, and is a co-adjutor of होतृ. Each of the four principal priests, होतृ, अध्वर्यु, ब्रह्मन् and उद्रातृ has three assistants, the total number of priests employed at Soma sacrifices being therefore 16; °सामन् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of the Sāman to be chanted by an अच्छावाक, also called उद्वंशीय.
